FuncDef: This command configures the least significant two bytes of the BMAC used as the source BMAC for packets generated from the Ethernet-Segment in PBB-EVPN.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the two least significant bytes of the es-bmac. Values-1 to 65535, or xx-xx or xx:xx.
Specifies the reserved space in the FDB for a specified es-bmac. By default the system reserves 8 entries for a specified Ethernet-Segment BMAC. Values-1 to 511999. ParamDefault: Default- 8
